meanings.definition: A type of martial art that combines elements of boxing and kicking.
meanings.sent1: My friend joined a kickbox class to learn how to punch and kick.
meanings.sent2: I watched a kickbox match on TV last night, and the fighters were very skilled.
meanings.sent3: Why did the kickbox class at the gym have so many punching bags but no birthday cake?
meanings.sent4: In the world of martial arts, kickbox is like a dance between fists and feet.
meanings.sent5: The sound of a kickbox match is a symphony of punches and kicks.

meanings.definition: To engage in the sport of kickboxing.
meanings.sent1: I want to kickbox to stay fit and learn self-defense.
meanings.sent2: She loves to kickbox at the gym every evening after work.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to kickbox with the toy mouse, showing off its agility.
meanings.sent4: When faced with challenges, she kickboxes her way through them with determination.
meanings.sent5: The waves kickbox against the shore, never giving up their rhythmic battle.

meanings.sent1: The kickbox at the gym is a professional fighter with many trophies.
meanings.sent2: She is a dedicated kickbox who trains hard every day.
meanings.sent3: The kickbox walked into the ring with confidence, ready to show off his skills.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the hero is a kickbox who fights for justice and honor.
meanings.sent5: The kickbox's speed and agility make them a formidable opponent in the ring.
